item.description:
Following a meeting around the table beginning at 6:00 PM
(feel welcome to bring dinner), film begins around 7:00;
discussion follows. Resources will be available.

7:00 PM - ENDGAME: Blueprint for Global Enslavement
139 min -

Endgame: Blueprint for Global Enslavement
Documentary filmmaker Alex Jones chronicles the history of the global elite's bloody rise to power and reveals how they have funded dictators and financed the bloodiest wars?creating order out of chaos to pave the way for the first true world empire.

See this link for > files to download

and Flyby News.
item.name: ENDGAME - Blueprint for Global Enslavement
